alert.note: Alert for Burke; Mountrail; Ward (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 6:13PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHWESTERN WARD, SOUTHEASTERN BURKE AND NORTH CENTRAL MOUNTRAIL COUNTIES THROUGH 645 PM CDT... At 612 PM CDT, a strong thunderstorm was located 8 miles southwest of Kenmare, or 20 miles northeast of Stanley, moving northwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...An US Air Force Weather Station reported a wind gust of 51 MPH at 607 PM CDT. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Ward, southeastern Burke and north central Mountrail Counties, including the following locations... Coteau and Niobe. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
